articles.content: Equity indices ended lower in a choppy trade on the Budget day. Market sentiments were also dampened after the US Fed indicated it likely won't cut interest rates in March.IndiGo, Tata Motors, JSW In… [+1310 chars]

articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: Anand Mahindra hosts Cheeku, the viral Noida boy wanting to buy Thar for Rs 700, at Chakan manufacturing p - The Economic Times
articles.description: Anand Mahindra recently played host to Cheeku, the viral sensation from Noida who captured hearts with his desire to buy a Mahindra Thar for just Rs 700. The heartwarming video showcases Cheeku's special visit to Mahindra's Chakan manufacturing plant, fulfill…
